GK22vidsrgpu:1656: dolālolāḥ śvasana-marutaś cakṣuṣī nirjharābhe tasyāḥ śuṣyat-tagara-sumanaḥ-pāṇḍurā gaṇḍa-bhittiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1657: tad-gātrāṇāṃ kim iva hi bahu brūmahe durbalatvaṃ yeṣām agre pratipad uditā candralekhāpy atanvī // VidSrk_18.18 *(552) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1659: asyās tāpam ahaṃ mukunda kathayāmy eṇīdṛśas te kathaṃ padminyāḥ sarasaṃ dalaṃ vinihitaṃ yasyāḥ satāpe hṛdi /
GK22vidsrgpu:1660: ādau śuṣyati saṃkucaty anu tataś cūrṇatvam āpadyate paścān murmuratāṃ dadhad dahati ca śvāsāvadhūtaḥ śikhī // VidSrk_18.19 *(553) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1664: viṣaṃ candrālokaḥ kumuda-vana-vāto hutavahaḥ kṣata-kṣāro hāraḥ sa khalu puṭa-pāko malayajaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1665: aye kiṃcid vakre tvayi subhaga sarve katham amī samaṃ jātās tasyām ahaha viparīta-prakṛtayaḥ // VidSrk_18.20 *(554) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1667: tvāṃ cintā-parikalpitaṃ subhaga sā saṃbhāvya romāñcitā śūnyāliṅgana-saṃcalad-bhuja-yugenātmānam āliṅgati /
GK22vidsrgpu:1668: kiṃ cānyad-viraha-vyathā-praṇayiṇīṃ saṃprāpya mūrcchāṃ cirāt pratyujjīvati karṇa-mūla-paṭhitais tvan-nāma-mantrākṣaraiḥ // VidSrk_18.21 *(555) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1670: gāḍhāv adhaḥ-kṛta-bali-tritayau susaṅga tuṅgau stanāv iti tayos talam ārtam āgāt /*
GK22vidsrgpu:1671: tasyāḥ sphuṭaṃ hṛdayam ity api na smareṣūnta rakṣataḥ praviśato vimukho 'tha vā kva // VidSrk_18.22 *(556) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:1673: mṛga-śiśu-dṛśas tasyās tāpaṃ kathaṃ kathayāmi te dahana-patitā dṛṣṭā mūrtir mayā na hi vaidhavī /
GK22vidsrgpu:1674: iti tu niyataṃ nārī-rūpaḥ sa loka-dṛśāṃ priyas tava śaṭhatayā śilpotkarṣo vidher vighaṭiṣyate // VidSrk_18.23 *(557) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1678: iyam iva karajaḥ kṣīṇas tvam iva kaṭhorāṇi parvāṇi // VidSrk_18.24 *(558) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:1684: prauḍha-prema-rasān nitamba-phalakād viśraṃsite 'py aṃśuke kāñcī-dāma-maṇi-prabhābhir anu cārabdhe dukūlāntare /
GK22vidsrgpu:1685: kāntenāśu mudhā vilokitam atho tanvyā mudhā lajjitaṃ bhūyo 'nena mudhāvakṛṣṭam atha tat tanvyā mudhā saṃvṛtam // VidSrk_19.1 *(559) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1686: rūḍhe rati-vyatikare karaṇīya-śeṣam āyāsa-bhāji dayite muhur āturāyāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1687: pratyakṣaraṃ madana-mantharam arthayantyāḥ kiṃ kiṃ na hanta hṛdayaṅgamam aṅganāyāḥ // VidSrk_19.2 *(560) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1688: ratānta-śrāntāyāḥ stana-jaghana-saṃdānita-dṛśi smarāveśa-vyagre davayati dukūlaṃ praṇayini /
GK22vidsrgpu:1689: kṣaṇaṃ śroṇau pāṇī kṣaṇam api kucāgre priya-dṛśoḥ kṣaṇaṃ vinyasyantyār jagad api na mūlyaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ // VidSrk_19.3 *(561) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1690: tais tair vijṛmbhita-śatair madanopadeśair mugdhā vidhāya laḍitāni ca tāni tāni /
GK22vidsrgpu:1691: aṅke nilīya kamituḥ śithilāṅga-mudrā nidrāti nālpa-tapasaḥ phala-saṃpad eṣā // VidSrk_19.4 *(562) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1692: yad vrīḍā-bhara-bhugnam āsya-kamalaṃ yac cakṣur atyullasat-d pakṣma-śreṇi yad aṅgam aṅgaja-mano-rājya-śriyām āśrayaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1693: yad vardhiṣṇu manobhava-pranayitā yan manda-manyu-grahasḥ tenaiveha mano haraty adharita-prauḍhā navoḍhā na kim // VidSrk_19.5 *(563) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1694: sa svargād aparo vidhiḥ sa ca sudhāsekaḥ kṣaṇaṃ netrayos tat-sāmrājyam agañjitaṃ tad aparaṃ premṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāspadam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1695: yad bālā balavan manobhava-bhaya-bhraśyat-trapaṃ satrapā tat-kālocita-narma-karma dayitādamyāsyam abhyasyati // VidSrk_19.6 *(564) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1697: samāliṅgaty aṅgair apasarati yat preyasi vapuḥ pidhātuṃ yad dṛśyaṃ ghaṭayati ghanāliṅganam api /
GK22vidsrgpu:1698: tapobhir bhūyobhiḥ kim u na kamanīyaṃ sukṛtinām idaṃ ramyaṃ vāmyaṃ madana-vivaśāyā mṛgadṛśaḥ // VidSrk_19.7 *(565) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1700: idam amṛtam ameyaṃ seyam ānanda-sindhur madhu-madhuram apīdaṃ kiṃcid antar dhunoti /
GK22vidsrgpu:1701: yad ayam udaya-līlā-lālasānāṃ vadhūnāṃ rati-vinimaya-bhājāṃ kelibhir yāti kālaḥ // VidSrk_19.8 *(566) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1702: ko 'sau sundari puṣpa-sāyaka-sakhaḥ saubhāgya-vārāṃ-nidhaḥ ko 'sāv indumukhi prasanna-hṛdayaḥ kaḥ kumbhi-kumbha-stani /
GK22vidsrgpu:1703: yasmin vismayanīya-tapta-tapase svairaṃ samucchṛṅkhalā viśrāmyanti tava smara-jvara-harāḥ kandarpa-keli-śriyaḥ // VidSrk_19.9 *(567) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1705: ātte vāsasi roddhum akṣamatayā doḥ-kandalībhyāṃ stanau tasyoraḥ-sthalam uttarīya-viṣaye sadyo mayā sañjitam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1706: śroṇīṃ tasya kare 'dhirohati punar vrīḍāmbudhau mām atho majjantīm udatārayan manasijo devaḥ sa mūrcchā-guruḥ // VidSrk_19.10 *(568) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1708: yad etad dhanyānām urasi yuvatī-saṅga-samaye samārūḍhaṃ kiṃcit pulakam idam āhuḥ kila janāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1709: matis tv eṣāsmākaṃ kuca-yuga-taṭī-cumbaka-śilā- niveśād ākṛṣṭaḥ smara-śara-śalākotkara iva // VidSrk_19.11 *(569) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1711: aṃsākṛṣṭa-dukūlayā sarabhasaṃ gūḍhau bhujābhyāṃ stanāv ākṛṣṭe jaghanāṃśuke kṛtam adhaḥ saṃsaktam ūru-dvayam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1712: nābhī-mūla-nibaddha-cakṣuṣi tayā brīḍānatāṅgyā priye dīpaḥ phūtkṛti-vāta-vepita-śikhaḥ karṇotphalenāhataḥ // VidSrk_19.12 *(570) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1716: tad-aṃśukā-kṣepam adhīra-pāṇe vimuñca kāñcī-maṇayo raṇanti // VidSrk_19.13 *(571) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1718: kānte talpam upāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ tat-kṣaṇāt tad-vāsaḥ ślatha-mekhalā-guṇa-dhṛtaṃ kiṃcin nitambe sthitam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1719: etāvat sakhi vedmi kevalam ahaṃ tasyāṅga-saṅge punaḥ ko 'sau kāsmi rataṃ tu kiṃ katham iti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ // VidSrk_19.14 *(572) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1727: atiprauḍhā rātrir bahala-śikha-dīpaḥ prabhavati priyaḥ premārabdha-smara-vidhi-rasajñaḥ param asau /
GK22vidsrgpu:1728: sakhi svairaṃ svairaṃ suratam akarod vrīḍita-vapuḥ yataḥ paryaṅgo 'yaṃ ripur iva kaḍat-kāra-mukharaḥ // VidSrk_19.15 *(573) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1729: dhanyāsi yat kathayasi priya-saṃgamena narma-smitaṃ ca vadanaṃ ca rasaṃ ca tasya /
GK22vidsrgpu:1730: nīvīṃ prati praṇihite tu kare priyeṇa sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiṃcid api smarāmi // VidSrk_19.16 *(574) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1736: sahūṅkārojjṛmbhā smara-paravaśā kānta-vimukhaṃ mukhaṃ mugdhāpāṅgaṃ kṣipati virasaṃ prauḍha-yuvatī // VidSrk_19.18 *(576) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1738: api taruṇayoḥ kiṃ syāt tasyāṃ divi spṛhayālutāḥ mukulita-dṛśor udbhidyante na ced viraha-tviṣaḥ // VidSrk_19.19 *(577) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1739: tasyāpāṅga-vilokitasya madhura-prollāsitārdha-bhruvas tasya smera-śuceḥ kramasya ca girāṃ mugdhākṣarāṇāṃ hriyā /
GK22vidsrgpu:1740: bhāvānām api tādṛśāṃ mṛgadṛśo hāvānugānām aho nādhanyaḥ kurute prarūḍha-pulakair ātithyam aṅgair janaḥ // VidSrk_19.20 *(578) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1741: samākṛṣṭaṃ vāsaḥ katham api haṭhāt paśyati tadā kramād ūru-dvandvaṃ jaraṭha-śara-gauraṃ mṛga-dṛśaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1742: tayā dṛṣṭiṃ dattvā mahati maṇi-dīpe nipuṇayā niruddhaṃ hastābhyāṃ jhagiti nija-netrotpala-yugam // VidSrk_19.21 *(579) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1745: analpaṃ saṃtāpaṃ śamayati manojanma-janitaṃ tathā śītaṃ sphītaṃ himavati niśīthe glapayati /
GK22vidsrgpu:1746: tad evaṃ ko 'py ūṣmā ramaṇa-parirambhotsava-milat- purandhrī-nīrandhra-stana-kalaśa-janmā vijayate // VidSrk_19.22 *(580) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1753: muhur vrīḍāvatyāḥ pratihasitavatyāḥ pratimuhur muhur viśrāntāyā muhur abhiniviṣṭa-vyavasiteḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1754: śramāmbhobhis tamyat-tilaka-malikā-ghūrṇa-dalakaṃ mukhaṃ līlāvatyā harati viparīta-vyatikare // VidSrk_19.25 *(583) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1756: āstāṃ dūreṇa viśleṣaḥ priyām āliṅgato mama /
GK22vidsrgpu:1757: svedaḥ kiṃ na sarinnātho romāñcaḥ kiṃ na parvataḥ // VidSrk_19.26 *(584) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1758: cirārūḍha-prema-praṇaya-parihāsena hṛtayā tad-ārabdhaṃ tanvyā na tu yad abalāyāḥ samucitam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1759: anirvyūḍhe tasmin prakṛti-sukumārāṅga-latayā punar lajjālolaṃ mayi vinihitaṃ locana-yugam // VidSrk_19.27 *(585) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1762: sapadi maraṇam eva sā tu yāyād yadi na pibed adharāmṛtaṃ priyasya // VidSrk_19.28 *(586) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1763: mugdhe tavāsmi dayitā dayito bhava tvam ity uktayā na hi na hīti śiro 'vadhūya /
GK22vidsrgpu:1764: svasmāt karān mama kare valayaṃ kṣipantyā vācaṃ vinābhyupagamaḥ kathito mṛgākṣyā // VidSrk_19.29 *(587) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1769: ardhocchvāsa-sphuṭa-nakha-padālaṃkṛtābhyāṃ stanābhyāṃ dṛṣṭā dhārṣṭya-smṛti-nata-mukhī mohanānte mayā sā // VidSrk_19.31 *(589) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1772: harati rati-vimarde lupta-pātrāṅkuratvātd prakaṭa-nakha-padāṅkaḥ kiṃ ca romāñca-mudraḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1773: hariṇa-śiśu-dṛśo 'syā mugdha-mugdhaṃ hasantyāḥ pariṇata-śara-kāṇḍa-snigdha-pāṇḍuḥ kapolaḥ // VidSrk_19.32 *(590) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1775: kara-kisalayaṃ dhūtvā dhūtvā vilambita-mekhalā kṣipati sumano-mālā-śeṣaṃ pradīpa-śikhāṃ prati /
GK22vidsrgpu:1776: sthagayati karaiḥ patyur netre vihasya samākulā surata-viratau ramyaṃ tanvī punaḥ punar īkṣitum // VidSrk_19.33 *(591) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1781: prāyaḥ kānte rati-śrānte kāminī puruṣāyate // VidSrk_19.34 *(592) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1782: bhāvodgāḍham upoḍha-kampa-pulakair aṅgaiḥ samāliṅgitaṃ rāgāc cumbitam apy upetya vadanaṃ pītaṃ ca vaktrāmṛtam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1783: jalpantyaiva muhur naneti nibhṛtaṃ pradhvasta-cāritrayā niḥśeṣeṇa samāpito rati-vidhir vācā tu nāṅgīkṛtaḥ // VidSrk_19.35 *(593) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1785: yat pīna-stana-bhāra-lālasa-lasad-vāsaḥ sphurad-gaṇḍayā tanvaṅgyā rabhasārpitaṃ sarabhasaṃ vaktraṃ muhuḥ pīyate /
GK22vidsrgpu:1786: tac chlāghyaṃ surataṃ ca tat tad amṛtaṃ tad vastu tad brahma tac ceto-hāri tad eva tat kim api tat tattvāntaraṃ sarvathā // VidSrk_19.36 *(594) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1787: na bata vidhṛtaḥ kāñcī-sthāne karaḥ ślatha-vāsasi prahitam asakṛd dīpe cakṣur ghana-sthira-tejasi /
GK22vidsrgpu:1788: kuca-kalaśayor ūḍhaḥ kampas tayā mama saṃnidhau manasija-rujo bhāvair uktā vacobhir apahnutāḥ // VidSrk_19.37 *(595) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1790: harṣāśru-dūṣita-vilocanayā mayādya kiṃ tasya tat sakhi nirūpitam aṅgam aṅgam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1791: romāñca-kañcuka-tiraskṛta-dehayā vā jñātāni tāni parirambha-sukhāni kiṃ vā // VidSrk_19.38 *(596) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1794: sa kasmān me preyān sakhi katham ahaṃ tasya dayitā yato māṃ spṛṣṭvaiva snapayati karaṃ sveda-payasā /
GK22vidsrgpu:1795: vilokyāśleṣād apy avahita ivāmīlya nayane vyudañcad-romāñca-sthagita-vapur āliṅgati samām // VidSrk_19.39 *(597) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1796: kim api kim api mandaṃ mandam āsatti-yogād avicalita-kapolaṃ jalpatoś ca krameṇa /
GK22vidsrgpu:1797: aśithila-parirambha-vyāpṛtaikaika-doṣṇor avidita-gata-yāmā rātrir eva vyaraṃsīt // VidSrk_19.40 *(598) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1799: dākṣiṇyād abhimānato rasa-vaśād viśrāma-hetor mama prāgalbhyāt yad anuṣṭhitaṃ mṛgadṛśā śakyaṃ na tad yoṣitām /
GK22vidsrgpu:1800: nirvyūḍhaṃ na yadā tayā tad akhilaṃ khinnais tatas tārakaiḥ sa-vrīḍaiś ca vilokitair mayi punar nyastaḥ samasto vyayaḥ // VidSrk_19.41 *(599) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1802: valita-manasor apy anyonyaṃ samāvṛta-bhāvayoḥ punar upacita-prāya-premṇoḥ punas trapa-māṇayoḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1803: iha hi niviḍa-vrīḍānaṅga-jvarātura-cetasor nava-taruṇayoḥ ko jānīte kim adya phaliṣyati // VidSrk_19.42 *(600) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1805: draṣṭuṃ ketaka-patra-garbha-subhagām ūru-prabhām utsukas tat-saṃvāhana-līlayā ca śanakair utkṣipta-caṇḍātakaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1808: nidrārtaṃ kila locanaṃ mṛgadṛśā viśleṣayantyā kathāṃ dīrghāpāṅga-sarit-taraṅga-taralaṃ śayyām anupreṣitam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1809: ujjṛmbhaḥ kila vallabho 'pi virate vastuny api prastute ghūrṇantī kila sāpi hūṅkṛtavatī śūnyaṃ sakhī dakṣiṇā // VidSrk_19.44 *(602) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1810: dṛṣṭvaikāsana-saṃshtite priyatame paścād upetyādarād ekasyā nayane pidyāya vihita-krīḍānubandha-cchalaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1811: īṣad-vakrima-kandharaḥ sa-pulakaḥ premollasan-mānasām antar-hāsa-lasat-kapola-phalakāṃ dhūrto 'parāṃ cumbati // VidSrk_19.45 *(603) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1814: kucopāntaṃ kānte likhati nakharāgrair akalitaṃ tataḥ kiṃcit paścād valati ca mukhendau mṛgadṛśaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1815: bahir vyājāmarṣa-prasara-paruṣāntar-gata-rasā nirīkṣyā re māyī kim idam iti pūrvā vijayate // VidSrk_19.46 *(604) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1817: āśleṣaḥ prathamaṃ krameṇa vijite kṛtye dhanasyārpaṇaṃ keli-dyūta-vidhau paṇaṃ priyatame kāntāṃ punaḥ pṛcchati /
GK22vidsrgpu:1818: antar-gūḍha-vigāḍha-saṃbhrama-rasa-sphārī-bhavad-gaṇḍayā tūṣṇīṃ śāri-visāraṇāya nihitaḥ khedāmbu-garbhaḥ karaḥ // VidSrk_19.47 *(605) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1823: bhogaḥ sa yadyapi jaye ca parājaye ca yūnor manas tad api vāñchati jetum eva // VidSrk_19.48 *(606) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1826: kalaha-kalayā yat saṃvṛtyai trapāvanatānanā pihita-pulakodbhedaṃ subhrūś cakarṣa na kañcukam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1827: dayitam abhitas tām utkaṇṭhāṃ vivavrur anantaraṃ jhaṭiti jhaṭiti truṭyanto 'ntaḥ stanāṃśuka-sandhayaḥ // VidSrk_19.49 *(607) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1829: nidhuvana-yudhas tūryātodyaṃ jahāra nata-bhruvāṃ jaghana-sarasī-haṃsa-svānaḥ śrutiṃ rasanā-ravaḥ // VidSrk_19.50 *(608) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1830: yugalam agalat tarṣotkarṣe tarūtpala-gaurayoḥ paṭu-vighaṭanād ūrvoḥ pūrvaṃ priye paripaśyati /
GK22vidsrgpu:1831: śruti-kuvalayaṃ dīpocchittyai nirāsa yad aṅganā jvalati rasanā-rocir dīpe tad āpa nirarthatām // VidSrk_19.51 *(609) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1833: daśana-daśanair oṣṭho mamlau na pallava-komalo vyasahata nakha-cchedānaṅgaṃ śirīṣa-mṛdu-cchavi /
GK22vidsrgpu:1834: na bhuja-latikā-gāḍhāśleṣaiḥ śramaṃ lalitā yayur yuvatiṣu kim apy avyākhyeyaṃ smarasya vijṛmbhitam // VidSrk_19.52 *(610) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1836: kim upagamitā bhartrā tapta-dviloha-vedakatāṃ uta ramayituḥ syūtāṅge 'ṅge śitaiḥ smara-sāyakaiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1837: vilayanam atha prāptā rāgānaloṣmabhir ity aho na pati-bhujayor niṣyandāntaḥ priyā niravīyata // VidSrk_19.53 *(611) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1843: rājanti kānta-nakhara-kṣatayo mṛgākṣyā lākṣā-rasa-drava-mucaḥ kucayor upānte /
GK22vidsrgpu:1844: antaḥ-pravṛddha-makara-dhvaja-pāvakasya śaṅke vibhidya hṛdayaṃ niraguḥ sphuliṅgāḥ // VidSrk_20.1 *(612) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1850: kvacit tāmbūlāṅkaḥ kvacid agaru-paṅkāṅka-malinaḥ kvacic cūrṇodgāraiḥ kvacid api ca sālaktaka-padaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1851: valī-bhaṅgābhogeṣv alaka-patitākīrṇa-kusumaḥ striyāḥ sarvāvasthaṃ kathayati rataṃ pracchada-paṭaḥ // VidSrk_20.3 *(614) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1853: āvṛṇoti vivṛṇoti cekṣate labdha-ratnam iva duḥkhito janaḥ // VidSrk_20.4 *(615) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1855: uṣasi guru-samakṣaṃ lajjamānā mṛgākṣīr atirutam anukartuṃ rājakīre pravṛtte /
GK22vidsrgpu:1859: pradoṣe dampatyor nija-ruci-vibhinne praṇayinor vibhinne saṃpanne ghana-timira-saṃketa-gahane /
GK22vidsrgpu:1860: ratautsukyāt tāmyat-tarala-manasoḥ paryavasite kṛtārthatve 'nyonyaṃ tad anu viditau kiṃ na kurutām // VidSrk_20.6 *(617) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1862: kiṃ vāsasā stanāntaṃ ruṇatsi hima-ruci-kṛte vacmi // VidSrk_20.7 *(618) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:1863: yad rātrau rahasi vyapeta-vinayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ rasāt kāminor anyonyaṃ śayanīyam īhita-rasa-vyāpti-pravṛtta-spṛham /
GK22vidsrgpu:1864: tat sānanda-milad-dṛśoḥ katham api smṛtvā gurūṇāṃ puroaḥ hāsodbheda-nirodha-manthara-milat-tāraṃ kathaṃcit sthitam // VidSrk_20.8 *(619) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1865: kiṃ bhūṣaṇena racitena hiraṇmayena kiṃ rocanādi-racitena viśeṣakeṇa /
GK22vidsrgpu:1866: ārdrāṇi kuṅkuma-rucīni vilāsinīnām aṅgeṣu kiṃ nakha-padāni na maṇḍalāni // VidSrk_20.9 *(620) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1867: dampatyor niśi jalpator gṛha-śukenākarṇitaṃ yad-vacas tat prātar guru-sannidhau nigadatas tasyopahāraṃ vadhūḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1868: karṇālaṃkṛti-padma-rāga-śakalaṃ vinyasya cañcū-puṭe vrīḍārtā prakaroti dāḍima-phala-vyājena vāg-bandhanam // VidSrk_20.10 *(621) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1871: prayacchāhāraṃ me yadi tava raho-vṛttam akhilaṃ mayā vācyaṃ noccair iti gṛha-śuke jalpati śanaiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1872: vadhū-vaktraṃ vrīḍābhara-namitam antar vihasitaṃ haraty ardhonmīlan-nalina-malināvarjitam iva // VidSrk_20.11 *(622) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1876: nakha-kṣataṃ yan nava-candra-sannibhaṃ sthitaṃ kṛśāṅgi stana-maṇḍale tava /
GK22vidsrgpu:1877: idaṃ tarītuṃ trivalī-taraṅgiṇīṃ virājate pañca-śarasya naur iva // VidSrk_20.12 *(623) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1879: haṃho kānta raho-gatena bhavatā yat-pūrvam āveditaṃ nirbhinnā tanur āvayor iti mayā taj-jātam adya sphuṭam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1880: kāminyā smara-vedanākula-dṛśā yaḥ keli-kāle kṛtaḥ so 'tyarthaṃ katham anyathā dahati mām eṣa tvad-oṣṭha-vraṇaḥ // VidSrk_20.13 *(624) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1885: nakha-pada-valinābhīsandhi-bhāgeṣu lakṣyaḥ kṣatiṣu ca daśanānām aṅganāyāḥ sa-śeṣaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1886: api rahasi kṛtānāṃ vāg-vihīno 'pi jātaḥ surata-vilasitānāṃ varṇako varṇako 'sau // VidSrk_20.15 *(626) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1888: nava-nakha-padam aṅgaṃ gopayasy aṃśukena sthagayasi punar oṣṭhaṃ pāṇinā danda-daṣṭam /
GK22vidsrgpu:1889: pratidiśam apara-strī-saṃga-śaṃsī visarpan nava-parimala-gandhaḥ kena śakyo varītum // VidSrk_20.16 *(627) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1892: eṇīdṛśaḥ kusuma-cāpa-narendra-dattā jaitra-praśastir iva citra-lipir vibhāti // VidSrk_20.17 *(628) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1895: mugdhe hastaḥ kim-artho 'yam apārtha iha dīyate // VidSrk_20.18 *(629) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1896: dara-mlānaṃ vāso lulita-kusumālaṃkṛti śiraḥ ślathālokaṃ cakṣuḥ sarasa-nakha-lekhāṅkitam uraḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:1897: lasat-kāñcī-granthi-sphurad-aruṇa-ratnāṃśu jaghanaṃ priyāṅgonmṛṣṭāṅgyā viṣam idam iyad bhāvaka-nṛṇām // VidSrk_20.19 *(630) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1899: pratyūṣe guru-sannidhau gṛha-śuke tat-tad-raho-jalpitaṃ prastotuṃ parihāsa-kāriṇi padair ardhoditair udyate /
GK22vidsrgpu:1900: krīḍā-śārikayā nilīya nibhṛtaṃ trotuṃ trapārtāṃ vadhūṃ prārabdhaḥ sahasaiva saṃbhrama-karo mārjāra-garjā-ravaḥ // VidSrk_20.20 *(631) //
GK22vidsrgpu:1902: talpe campaka-kalpite sakhi gṛhodyāne 'dya suptāsi kiṃ tat-kiñjalka-cayaṃ na paśyasi kucopānte vimardāruṇam /

GK22vidsrgpu:2096: śravasi na kṛtāste tāvantaḥ sakhī-vacana-kramāś caraṇa-patitoṅguṣṭhāgreṇāpy ayaṃ na hato janaḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:2099: na mando vaktrenduḥ śrayati na lalāṭaṃ kuṭilatā na netrābjaṃ rajyaty anuṣajati na bhrūr api bhidām /

GK22vidsrgpu:2102: tat tad vadaty api yathāvasaraṃ hasaty apy āliṅgane 'pi na niṣadhati cumbane 'pi /

GK22vidsrgpu:2107: dīrghocchvāsa-vikampitākula-śikhā yatra pradīpāḥ kule dṛṣṭir yatra ca dīrgha-jāgara-guruḥ kope madīye tava /

GK22vidsrgpu:2109: parīrambhārambhaḥ spṛśati param icchāṃ na tu bhujau bhajante vijñānaṃ na tu giram anūrodha-vidhayaḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:2112: adyodyāna-gṛhāṅgaṇe sakhi mayā svapnena lākṣāruṇaḥ protkṣipto 'yam aśoka-dohada-vidhau pādaḥ kvaṇan-nūpuraḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:2115: sakhi sa subhago manda-sneho mayīti na me vyathā vidhi-pariṇataṃ yasmāt sarvo janaḥ sukham aśnute /

GK22vidsrgpu:2123: tāvat pratyuta pāṇi-saṃpuṭa-lasan-nīvī-nibandhaṃ dhṛto dhāvitv eva kṛta-praṇāmakam aho premṇo vicitrā gatiḥ // VidSrk_21.62 *(696) //

GK22vidsrgpu:2135: nīvī-bandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇe tato mānenāpasṛtaṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pāda-spṛśi preyasi // VidSrk_21.65 *(699) //

GK22vidsrgpu:2146: devena prathamaṃ jito 'si śaśabhṛl-lekha-bhṛtānantaraṃ buddhenoddhata-buddhinā smara tataḥ kāntena pānthena me /

GK22vidsrgpu:2150: karṇe yan na kṛtaṃ sakhījana-vaco yan nādṛtā bandhu-vāk yat-pāde nipatann api priyatamaḥ karṇotpalenāhṛtaḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:2158: vatse naite payodāḥ surapati-kariṇo no bakāḥ karṇa-śaṅkāḥ saudāminyo 'pi naitāḥ kanaka-mayam idaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kumbha-pīṭhe /

GK22vidsrgpu:2163: asau gataḥ saugata eva yasmāt kuryān nirālambanatāṃ mamaiva /

GK22vidsrgpu:2248: kim iti kabarī yādṛk tādṛg dṛśau kim akajjale mṛgamada-masī-patra-nyāsaḥ sa kiṃ na kapolayoḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:2252: vāraṃ vāram alīka eva hi bhavān kiṃ vyāhṛtair gamyatām ity udgamya sumanda-bāhu-latikām utthāpayantyā ruṣā /

GK22vidsrgpu:2255: pakṣmāgra-grathitāśru-bindu-visarair muktā-phala-spardhibhiḥ kurvantyā hara-hāsa-hāri hṛdaye hārāvalī-bhūṣaṇam /

GK22vidsrgpu:2257: dahati viraheṣv aṅgān īrṣyāṃ karoti samāgame harati hṛdayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ karoty avaśāṃ tanum /
GK22vidsrgpu:2258: kṣaṇam api sukhaṃ yasmin prāpte gate ca na labhyate kim aparam ataś citraṃ yan me tathāpi sa vallabhaḥ // VidSrk_22.35 *(734) //
GK22vidsrgpu:2260: ko 'sau dhanyaḥ kathaya subhage kasya gaṅgā-sarayvos toyāsphāla-vyatikara-khaṇat-kāri kaṅkālam āste /

GK22vidsrgpu:2681: prārabdho maṇi-dīpa-yaṣṭiṣu vṛthā pātaḥ pataṅgair itoaḥ gandhāndhair abhito madhuvrata-kulair utpakṣmabhiḥ sthīyate /

GK22vidsrgpu:2683: vrajati kalita-stokāloko navīna-javāruṇa- cchavi-ravir asau svecchā-dṛśyau diśaṃ bhṛśam ap-pateḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:2815: mathnanti sthala-sīmni śaila-gahanotsaṅgeṣu saṃrundhate jīva-grāham iva kvacit kvacid api cchāyāsu gṛhṇanti ca // VidSrk_29.16 *(912) //

GK22vidsrgpu:3015: bhrāntyādaṣṭa-sphuṭa-bisalatā-cuñcubhiś cañcu-cakraiś cakrā bandīkṛta-viraha-kṛc-candralekhā ivaite // VidSrk_30.21 *(977) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3019: gaganodadhi-paścimānta-lagno vidhur uttāna ivāsti kūrma-rājaḥ // VidSrk_30.22 *(978) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3026: gīyante nagareṣu nāgara-jana-pratyūṣa-nidrānudo rādhā-mādhavayoḥ paraspara-rahaḥ-prastāvanā-gītayaḥ // VidSrk_30.24 *(980) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3032: madhyāhne paripuñjitais tarutala-cchāyā mṛgaiḥ sevyate kāsāre sphuṭitodare sunibhṛtaṃ kīṭair ahar nīyate /
GK22vidsrgpu:3034: etasmin divasasya madhya-samaye vāto 'pi caṇḍātapa- trāseneva na saṃcaraty ahima-gor-bimbe lalāṭaṃtape /

GK22vidsrgpu:3037: ādau māna-parigraheṇa guruṇā dūraṃ samāropitā paścāt tāpa-bhareṇa tānava-kṛtā nītā paraṃ lāghavam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3038: utsaṅgāntara-vartinām anugamāt saṃpīḍitā gām imāṃ sarvāṅga-praṇaya-priyām iva taru-cchāyā samālambate // VidSrk_31.3 *(983) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3041: kirati mihire viṣvadrīcaḥ karānati-vāmanī sthala-kamaṭhavad deha-cchāyā janasya viceṣṭate /
GK22vidsrgpu:3042: gajapati-mukhodgīrṇair āpyair api trasareṇubhiḥ śiśira-madhurām eṇāḥ kaccha-sthalīm adhiśerate // VidSrk_31.4 *(984) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3045: bhaumoṣma-plavamāna-sūra-kiraṇa-krūra-prakāśā dṛśor āyuḥ karma samāpayanti dhig amūr madhye 'hni śūnyā diśaḥ // VidSrk_31.5 *(985) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3048: rathyā-garbheṣu khelā-rasika-śiśu-guṇaṃ tyājayed pūrvakelīr uddaṇḍābja-cchadālī-talam upagamayed rājahaṃsī-kulāni /
GK22vidsrgpu:3049: adhyetṝṇāṃ dadhānaṃ bhṛśam ala-sadṛśāṃ kiṃcid aṅgāvasādaṃ devasyaitat samantād bhavatu samucita-śreyase madhyam ahnaḥ // VidSrk_31.6 *(986) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3051: kāśmaryāḥ kṛta-mālam udgata-dalaṃ koyaṣṭikaṣṭīkate nīrāśmantaka-śimbi-cumbana-mukhā dhāvanty apaḥ-pūrṇikāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3052: dātyūhais tiniśasya koṭaravati skandhe nilīya sthitaṃ vīrun-nīḍa-kapota-kūjitam anukrandanty adhaḥ kukkubhāḥ // VidSrk_31.7 *(987) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3054: uddāma-jvalad-aṃśu-māli-kiraṇa-vyarthātirekād iva cchāyāḥ saṃprati yānti piṇḍa-padavīṃ mūleṣu bhūmīruhām /
GK22vidsrgpu:3057: dhatte padma-latā-dalepsur upari khaṃ karṇatālaṃ dvipaḥ śaṣpa-stamba-rasān niyacchati śikhī madhye śikhaṇḍaṃ śiraḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3058: mithyā leḍhi mṛṇāla-koṭi-rabhasād daṃṣṭrāṅkuraṃ śūkaro madhyāhne mahiṣaś ca vāñchati nija-cchāyā-mahā-kardamam // VidSrk_31.9 *(989) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3062: viśantīnāṃ snātuṃ jaghana-pariveśair mṛgadṛśāṃ yad ambhaḥ saṃprāptaṃ pramada-vana-vāpyās taṭa-bhuvam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3063: gabhīre tan nābhī-kuhara-pariṇāhe 'dhvani sakṛt kuhuṅkāra-sphāraṃ racayati ca nādaṃ namati ca // VidSrk_31.10 *(990) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3066: viṣvaṅ murmura-narma bibhrati pathāṃ garbheṣv adabhrāḥ paṭu- jyotir mukta-nirabhra-dīdhiti-ghaṭā-nirdhūpitā dhūlayaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3067: megha-cchāya-dhiyābhidhāvati puro nirdagdha-dūrvāvanaṃ pānthaḥ kiṃ ca marīci-vīciṣu payaḥ-pūra-bhramaḥ klāmati // VidSrk_31.11 *(991) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3068: dhvāntānīla-vanādri-koṭara-gṛheṣv adhyāsate kokilāḥ pānthāḥ potavad āpibanti kaluṣaṃ dhānyāḥ prataptaṃ payaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3070: dhūmo 'ṭann aṭavīṣu cāṭu-paṭalānāṭīkayaty ucchalat- pāṃśu-prāṃśu-bharābhir ābhir abhito vātormibhir vartmanaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3071: utsarpad-dava-dhūma-vibhrama-bharaḥ kiṃ ca pratīcīr apaḥ kurvanty accha-marīci-vīci-nicaya-bhrāntyā hradānte mṛgāḥ // VidSrk_31.13 *(993) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3073: madhyāhne parinirmaleṣu śakulaḥ śaivālamālāmbuṣu sthūlatvāj jala-raṅgu-nirjita-bhayaḥ pucchāgra-romāvalīḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3074: līlā-tāṇḍava-ḍambarair avakiran pānīya-pūrṇodarasḥ tuṇḍāgrāt kṣaṇa-pīta-vāri-guḍikām udgīrya saṃlīyate // VidSrk_31.14 *(994) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3080: deva svasti vayaṃ dvijās tata itas tīrtheṣu sisnāsavaḥ kālindī-sura-sindhu-saṅga-payasi snātuṃ samīhāmahe /
GK22vidsrgpu:3081: tad yācemahi sapta-piṣṭapa-śucībhāvaikatāna-vrataṃ saṃyaccha svayaśaḥ sitāsita-payo-bhedād viveko 'stu naḥ // VidSrk_32.1 *(995) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3084: kiṃ vṛttāntaiḥ para-gṛha-gataiḥ kiṃtu nāhaṃ samarthas tūṣṇīṃ sthātuṃ prakṛti-mukharo dākṣiṇātya-svabhāvaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3085: deśe deśe vipaṇiṣu tathā catvare pāna-goṣṭhyām unmatteva bhramati bhavato vallabhā hanta kīrtiḥ // VidSrk_32.2 *(996) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3088: sā candrād api candanād api dara-vyākoṣa-kundād api kṣīrābdher api śeṣato 'pi phaṇinaś caṇḍīśa-hāsād api /
GK22vidsrgpu:3089: karṇātī-sita-danta-patra-mahaso 'py atyantam uddyotinī kīrtis te bhuja-vīrya-nirjita-ripor loka-trayaṃ bhrāmyati // VidSrk_32.3 *(997) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3095: yat kṣāraṃ ca malīmasaṃ ca jaladher ambhas tad ambhodharaiḥ kṛtvā svādu ca nirmalaṃ ca nihitaṃ yatnena śuktau tathā /
GK22vidsrgpu:3096: yenānarghatayā ca sundaratayā cedaṃ yaśobhis tava spardhām etya virājate nanu pariṇāmo 'dbhuto bhautikaḥ // VidSrk_32.5 *(999) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3098: dṛṣṭaṃ saṃgara-sākṣibhir nigaditaṃ vaitālika-śreṇibhir nyastaṃ cetasi khañjanaiḥ sukavibhiḥ kāvyeṣu saṃcāritam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3099: utkīrṇaṃ kuśalaiḥ praśastiṣu sadā gītaṃ ca nākeṣadāṃ dārer ujjayinī-bhujaṅga bhavataś candrāvadātaṃ yaśaḥ // VidSrk_32.6 *(1000) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3102: utkallolasya lakṣmīṃ lavaṇa-jalanidhir lambhitaḥ kṣīra-sindhoḥ ko vindhyaḥ kaś ca gaurī-gurur iti marutām abhyudasto vivekaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3103: nītāḥ karkatvam arka-pravahaṇa-harayo hāritotsaṅga-lakṣmā rājann uddāma-gaurair ajani ca rajanī-vallabhas tvad-yaśo bhoḥ // VidSrk_32.7 *(1001) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3106: rājann idaṃ bahula-pakṣa-dalan-mṛgāṅka- cchedojjvalais tava yaśobhir aśobhi viśvam // VidSrk_32.8 *(1002) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3107: svasti kṣīrābdhi-madhyān nija-dayita-bhujābhyantara-sthābja-hastā kṣmāyām akṣāma-kīrtiṃ kuśalayati mahā-bhūbhujaṃ bhojya-devam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3108: kṣemaṃ me 'nyad yugāntāvadhi tapatu bhavān yad-yaśo-ghoṣaṇābhiḥ devo nidrā-daridraḥ saphalayati harir yauvana-rddhiṃ mameti // VidSrk_32.9 *(1003) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3113: na kvacit sakhyas tās tava kutra kutra vada vāg lakṣmīs tathā kāntayaḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:3117: āsīd uptaṃ yad etad raṇa-bhuvi bhavatā vairi-mātaṅga-kumbhān muktā-bījaṃ tad etat trijagati janayāmāsa kīrti-drumaṃ te /
GK22vidsrgpu:3118: śeṣo mūlaṃ prakāṇḍaṃ hima-girir udadhir dugdha-pūrālavālaṃ jyotsnā śākhā-pratānaḥ kusumam uḍu-cayo yasya candraḥ phalaṃ ca // VidSrk_32.12 *(1006) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3120: adya svarga-vadhū-gaṇe guṇamaya tvat-kīrtim indūjjvalām uccair gāyati niṣkalaṅkima-daśām ādāsyate candramāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3121: gītā-karṇana-moda-mukta-yavasa-grāsābhilāṣo vada svāminn aṅka-mṛgaḥ kiyanti hi dināny etasya vartiṣyate // VidSrk_32.13 *(1007) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3123: abhayam abhayaṃ deva brūmas tavāsilatāvadhūḥ kuvalayadalaśyāmā śatror uraḥsthalaśāyinī /

GK22vidsrgpu:3126: dyām āvṛṇoti dharaṇī-talam ātanoti pātāla-mūla-timirāṇi tiraskaroti /

GK22vidsrgpu:3129: kiṃ tv ekaḥ param asti dūṣaṇa-kaṇo yan nopayāti bhramāt kṛṣṇaṃ śrīḥ śiti-kaṇṭham adri-tanayā nīlāmbaraṃ revatī // VidSrk_32.16 *(1010) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3130: airāvaṇanti kariṇaḥ phaṇino 'py aśeṣāḥ śeṣanti hanta vihagā api haṃsitāraḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:3134: rāmaḥ sainya-samanvitaḥ kṛta-śilā-setur yad ambhonidheḥ pāraṃ laṅghitavān purā tad adhunā nāścaryam utpādayet /
GK22vidsrgpu:3135: ekākiny api setu-bandha-rahitān saptāpi vārāṃ nidhīn helābhis tava deva kīrti-vanitā yasmāt samullaṅghati // VidSrk_32.18 *(1012) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:3137: na tac citraṃ yat te vitata-karavālogra-rasano mahī-bhāraṃ voḍhuṃ bhuja-bhujaga-rājaḥ prabhavati /

GK22vidsrgpu:3143: apanaya mahā-mohaṃ rājann anena tavāsinā kathaya kuhaka-krīḍāścaryaṃ kathaṃ kva ca śikṣitam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3144: yad ari-rudhiraṃ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ kusumbha-rasāruṇaṃ jhagiti vamati kṣīrāmbhodhi-pravāhasitaṃ yaśaḥ // VidSrk_32.21 *(1015) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3146: tvaṃ kāmboja virājase bhuvi bhavat-tāto divi bhrājate tat-tātas tu vibhūṣaṇaḥ sa kim api brahmaukasi dyotate /
GK22vidsrgpu:3147: yuṣmābhis tribhir ebhir arpita-tanus tvat-kīrtir ujjṛmbhiṇī māṇikya-stavaka-traya-praṇayinīṃ hārasya dhatte śriyam // VidSrk_32.22 *(1016) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3150: dig-vadhūnāṃ mukhe jātam akasmād ardha-kuṅkumam // VidSrk_32.23 *(1017) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3151: indor lakṣma tripura-jayinaḥ kaṇṭha-mūlaṃ murārir dig-nāgānāṃ mada-jalam asībhāñji gaṇḍa-sthalāni /
GK22vidsrgpu:3152: adyāpy urvī-valaya-tilaka śyāmalimnāvaliptāny ābhāsante vada dhavalitaṃ kiṃ yaśobhis tvadīyaiḥ // VidSrk_32.24 *(1018) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3157: aye muktā-ratna prasara bahir uddyotaya gṛhān api kṣoṇīndrāṇāṃ kuru phalavataḥ svān api guṇān /
GK22vidsrgpu:3158: kim atraivātmānaṃ jarayasi mudhā śukti-kuhare mahā-gambhīro 'yaṃ jaladhir iha kas tvāṃ gaṇayati // VidSrk_33.1 *(1019) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3160: apratyākalita-prabhāva-vibhave sarvāśrayāmbhonidhau vāso nālpa-tapaḥ-phalaṃ yad aparaṃ doṣo 'yam eko mahān /
GK22vidsrgpu:3161: śambūko 'pi yad atra durlabhatarair ratnair anarghaiḥ saha spardhām eka-nivāsa-kāraṇa-vaśād ekāntato vāñchati // VidSrk_33.2 *(1020) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3162: padmākaraḥ parimito 'pi varaṃ sa eva yasya sva-kāma-vaśataḥ paribhujyate śrīḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3163: kiṃ tena nīra-nidhinā mahatā taṭe 'pi yasyormayaḥ prakupitā galahastayanti // VidSrk_33.3 *(1021) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3165: nīre 'smin amṛtāṃśum utsukatayā kartuṃ kare kautukin mā nimne 'vatarārjavād iyam adhas tasya praticchāyikā /
GK22vidsrgpu:3166: martye 'sya grahaṇaṃ kva darśana-sudhāpy unmukta-netra-śriyāṃ svar-loke 'pi lavaḥ śaveśvara-jaṭā-jūṭaika-cūḍāmaṇiḥ // VidSrk_33.4 *(1022) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3168: kenāsīnaḥ sukham akaruṇenākarād uddhṛtas tvaṃ vikretuṃ vā tvam abhilaṣitaḥ kena deśāntare 'smin /
GK22vidsrgpu:3169: yasmin vitta-vyaya-bhara-saho grāhakas tāvad āstāṃ nāsti bhrātar marakata-maṇe tvat-parīkṣākṣamo 'pi // VidSrk_33.5 *(1023) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3174: mūrdhāropaṇa-satkṛtair diśi diśi kṣudrair vihaṅgair gataṃ chāyā-dāna-nirākṛta-śrama-bharair naṣṭaṃ mṛgair bhīrubhiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3175: hā kaṣṭaṃ phala-lolupair apasṛtaṃ śākhāmṛgaiś cañcalair ekenaiva davānala-vyatikaraḥ soḍhaḥ paraṃ śākhinā // VidSrk_33.6 *(1024) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3177: ayaṃ vārām eko nilaya iti ratnākara iti śrito 'smābhis tṛṣṇā-taralita-manobhir jalanidhiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3178: ka evaṃ jānīte nija-kara-puṭī-koṭara-gataṃ kṣaṇādenaṃ tāmyat-timi-makaram āpāsyati muniḥ // VidSrk_33.7 *(1025) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3183: janma vyoma-saraḥ-saroja-kuhare mitrāṇi kalpa-drumāḥ krīḍā svarga-purandhribhiḥ paricitāḥ sauvarṇa-vallī-srajaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3184: apy asmād avatāra eva bhavato nonmāda-bherī-ravaḥ samyaṅ mūrchiti-kelayaḥ punar ime bhṛṅga dvir abhyāhatiḥ // VidSrk_33.8 *(1026) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3185: aṅgenāṅgam anupraviśya milato hastāvalepādibhiḥ kā vārtā yudhi gandha-sindhura-pateḥgr gandho 'pi cet ke dvipāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3186: jetavyo 'sti hareḥ sa lāñchanam ato vandāmahe tām abhūd yad-garbhe śarabhaḥ svayaṃjaya iti śrutvāpi yo nāṅkitaḥ // VidSrk_33.9 *(1027) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3188: ājanma-sthitayo mahī-ruha ime kūle samunmūlitāḥ kallolāḥ kṣaṇa-bhaṅgurāḥ punar amī nītāḥ parām unnatim /
GK22vidsrgpu:3189: antaḥ prastara-saṃgraho bahir api bhraśyanti gandha-drumā bhrātaḥ śoṇa na so 'sti yo na hasati tvat-saṃpadāṃ viplave // VidSrk_33.10 *(1028) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3194: amuṃ kāla-kṣepaṃ tyaja jalada gambhīra-madhuraiḥ kim ebhir nirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3195: aye paśyāvasthām akaruṇa-samīra-vyatikara- sphurad-dāva-jvālāvali-jaṭila-mūrter viṭapinaḥ // VidSrk_33.11 *(1029) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3197: yuktaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ sumano-vināśa- kāle yad enam avanī-ruham etad astu /
GK22vidsrgpu:3198: etat tv adṛṣṭa-caram aśruta-vārtam etāḥ śākhā-tvaco 'pi tanu-kāṇḍa-samās tyajanti // VidSrk_33.12 *(1030) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3199: sa vandyaḥ pāthodaḥ sa khalu nayanānanda-jananaḥ parārthe nīce 'pi vrajati laghutāṃ yo 'rthi-subhagām /
GK22vidsrgpu:3200: kathāpi śrotavyā bhavati hata-ketor na ca punar janānāṃ dhvaṃsāya prabhavati hi yasyodgatir api // VidSrk_33.13 *(1031) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3202: apaśyat kāsāra-śriyam amṛta-varti-praṇayinīṃ sukhaṃ jīvaty andhūdaravivaravarti plava-kulam // VidSrk_33.14 *(1032) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3204: suvarṇakāra śravaṇocitāni vastūni vikretum ihāgatas tvam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3205: kuto 'pi nāśrāvi yad atra pallyāṃ pallīpatir yāvad aviddha-karṇaḥ // VidSrk_33.15 *(1033) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3206: yasyāvandhya-ruṣaḥ pratāpa-vasater nādena dhairya-druhāṃ śuṣyanti sma mada-pravāha-saritaḥ sadyo 'pi dig-dantinām /

GK22vidsrgpu:3611: ārād vīkṣya vipakva-sākrama-kṛta-krodha-sphurat-kandharaṃ śvā mallīkalikā-vikāśi-daśanaū kiṃcit kvaṇan gacchati // VidSrk_35.11 *(1158) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3613: tundī cet paricumbati priyatamāṃ svārthāt tato bhraśyati svārthaṃ cet kurute priyādhara-rasāsvādaṃ na vindaty asau /
GK22vidsrgpu:3614: taṃ cemaṃ ca karoti mūḍha-jaḍa-dhīḥ kāmāndha-mugdho yatas tundau tundita-vigrahasya surate naiko bhaven nāparaḥ // VidSrk_35.12 *(1159) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3617: pīnorudvaya-līna-cīna-vasanā stokāvanamrā jalāt tīrodde`ca-nimeṣa-lola-nayanā bāleyam uttiṣṭhati // VidSrk_35.13 *(1160) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3619: ambhomucāṃ salilam udgiratāṃ niśīthe tādī-vaneṣu nibhṛta-sthita-karṇa-tālāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3623: halāgrotkīrṇāyāṃ parisara-bhuvi grāma-caṭakā luṭhanti svacchandaṃ nakhara-śikharāc chotita-mṛdaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3629: payasi sarasaḥ svacche matsyāñjighṛkṣur itas tato valita-nayano mandaṃ mandaṃ padaṃ nidadhad bakaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3630: viyati vidhṛtaikāṅghris tirag vivartita-kandharo dalam api calat sa-pratyāśaṃ muhur muhur īkṣate // VidSrk_35.17 *(1164) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3634: ātmoddhatair api rajobhir alaṅghanīyā dhāvanty amī mṛga-javākṣamayeva rathyāḥ // VidSrk_35.18 *(1165) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3636: paścād aṅghrī prasārya tri-kanati-vitataṃ drāghayitvāṅgam uccair āsajyābhugna-kaṇṭho mukham urasi saṭāṃ ghūli-dhūmrāṃ vidhūya /
GK22vidsrgpu:3637: ghāsa-grāsābhilāṣād anavarata-calat-protha-tuṇḍas turaṅgo mandaṃ śabdāyamāno vilikhati śayanād utthitaḥ kṣmāṃ khureṇa // VidSrk_35.19 *(1166) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3642: pṛṣṭhāntaḥ pārśva-kaṇḍū-vyapa-nayana-rasād dvis-trir-udvartitāṅgaḥ protthāya drāṅ nirīhaḥ kṣaṇam atha vapur āsyānupūrvyāṃ dhunoti // VidSrk_35.20 *(1167) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3644: ādau vitatya caraṇo vinamayya kaṇṭham utthāpya vaktram abhihatya muhuś ca vatsāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3645: mātrā pravartita-mukhaṃ mukha-lihyamāna- paścārdha-sustha-manasaḥ stanam utpibanti // VidSrk_35.21 *(1168) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3647: priyāyāṃ svairāyām atikaṭhina-garbhālasatayā kirāte cākarṇī dhṛta-dhanuṣi dhāvaty anupadam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3648: priyā-prema-prāṇa-pratibhaya-vaśākṛta-vikalo mṛtgaḥ paścād ālokayati ca muhur yāti ca muhuḥ // VidSrk_35.22 *(1169) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3652: dūrādhva-bhrānti-khinnaḥ katham api śanakair aṅghri-pīḍāṃ niyamya svairendha-sphoṭanāya dvija-bhavanam anu snātakaḥ sāyam eti // VidSrk_35.23 *(1170) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3654: vāraṃ vāram udaṅghri-laṅghana-ghana-preṅkhan-nakha-kṣuṇṇayoḥ kāmaṃ kukkuṭayor dvayaṃ druta-pada-krūra-kramaṃ yudhyati // VidSrk_35.24 *(1171) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3656: ete jīrṇa-kulāya-kāla-jaṭilāḥ pāṃsūtkarākarṣiṇaḥ śākhā-kampa-vihasta-duḥstha-vihagān ākampayantas tarūn /
GK22vidsrgpu:3658: ete saṃtata-bhṛjyamāna-caṇakāmoda-pradhānā manaḥ karṣanty ūṣara-saṃniveśa-jaraṭha-cchāyāḥ sthalī-grāmakāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3660: asminn īṣad vitata-valita-stoka-vicchinna-bhugnaḥ kiṃcil-līlopacita-vinataḥ puñjitaś cotthitaś ca /
GK22vidsrgpu:3661: dhūmodgāras taruṇa-mahiṣa-skandho 'nīlo davāgneḥ svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patra-bhaṅgān // VidSrk_35.27 *(1174) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3664: kaiścid vīta-dayena bhoga-patinā niṣkāraṇopapluta- prakṣīṇair nija-vaṃśa-bhūr iti mitair atyajyamānāḥ kulaiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3665: grāmā nistṛṇa-jīrṇa-kuḍya-bahulāḥ svairaṃ bhramad-babhravaḥ prāyaḥ pāṇḍu-kapota-kaṇṭha-mukharārāme na yānty utkatām // VidSrk_35.28 *(1175) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3667: pavana-raya-tiraścīs toya-dhārāḥ pratīcchan viśati valita-śṛṅgaḥ pāmarāgāram ukṣā // VidSrk_35.29 *(1176) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3668: utplutyā gṛha-koṇataḥ pracalitāḥ stokāgrahaṅghaṃ tato vaktra-svaira-pada-kramair upagatāḥ kiṃcic calanto gale /
GK22vidsrgpu:3669: bhekāḥ pūtini-pātino micimicīty unmīlitārrdhekṣaṇāḥ nakrākāra-vidāritānana-puṭair nirmakṣikaṃ kurvate // VidSrk_35.30 *(1177) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3673: vikāsayati locane spṛśati pāṇinā kuñcite vidūram avalokayaty atisamīpa-saṃsthaṃ punaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3674: bahir vrajati sātape smarati netra-varteḥ pumān jarā-pramukha-saṃsthitaḥ samavalokayan pustakam // VidSrk_35.32 *(1179) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3676: prāyo rathyā-sthala-bhuvi rajaḥ-prāya-dūrvā-latāyāṃ jālmaiḥ pṛṣṭhāpahṛta-salavāḥ sakṣudho mām ahokṣāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3677: svairaṃ śvāsānila-taralitodbhūta-dhūlī-praveśa- pluṣṭa-prāṇā vihita-vidhuta-grāsa-vighnaṃ caranti // VidSrk_35.33 *(1180) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3679: laghutaram utplavamānāś caranti bījānti kalaviṅkāḥ // VidSrk_35.34 *(1181) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:3681: karāmbuja-dhṛtollasan-muśalam unnamantī muhuḥ pralambi-maṇi-mālinī kalam akaṇḍanī rājate // VidSrk_35.35 *(1182) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3683: utpucchaḥ pramadocchvasad vapur adho-visraṃsi-pakṣa-dvayaḥ svairotphāla-gati-krameṇa parito bhrāntvā salīlaṃ muhuḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3684: utkaṇṭhālasa-kūjitaḥ kala-rutāṃ bhūyo riraṃsā-rasa- nyag-bhūtāṃ caṭakaḥ priyām abhisaraty udvepamānaḥ kṣaṇam // VidSrk_35.36 *(1183) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3688: vicchidyamāna-kusumāsu jani-krameṇa pāka-kramaḥ kapiśimānam upādadhāti // VidSrk_35.37 *(1184) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3690: bakoṭāḥ pānthānāṃ śiśira-sarasī-sīmni saratām amī netrānandaṃ dadati caraṇācoṭita-mukhāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3695: niśvāsair atisaṃtatair buṣa-kaṇā-jālaṃ khale vikṣipann ukṣā goṣṭha-taṭīṣu labdha-vijayo go-vṛndam āskandati // VidSrk_35.39 *(1186) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3697: arcir-mālā-karālād divam abhilihato dāva-vahner adūrād uḍḍīyoḍḍīya kiṃcic-chalabha-kavalanānanda-manda-pracārāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3698: agre 'gre saṃraṭantaḥ pracuratara-masīpāta-durlakṣa-dhūmrāḥ dhūmyāṭāḥ paryaṭanti prativiṭapam amī niṣṭhurāḥ sva-sthalīṣu // VidSrk_35.40 *(1187) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3700: nīvāraudana-maṇḍam uṣṇa-madhuraṃ sadyaḥ-prasūta-priyā- pītād apy adhikaṃ tapo-vana-mṛgaḥ paryāptam ācāmati /
GK22vidsrgpu:3701: gandhena sphuratā manāg anusṛto bhaktasya sarpiṣmataḥ karkandhū-phala-miśra-śāka-pacanāmodaḥ paristīryate // VidSrk_35.41 *(1188) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3704: madhuram iva vadantaḥ svāgataṃ bhṛṅga-śabdair natim iva phala-namraiḥ kurvate 'mī śirobhiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3705: mama dadata ivārghaṃ puṣpa-vṛṣṭiṃ kirantaḥ kathaya nati-saparyāṃ śikṣitāḥ śākhino 'pi // VidSrk_35.42 *(1189) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3708: asmin vṛddha-vanecarī-karatalair dattāḥ sapañcāṅgulāḥ . . . . . . . . śikharibhiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ karālodarāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3710: tais tair jīvopahārair iha kuhara-śilāsaṃśrayām arcayitvā devīṃ kāntāra-durgāṃ rudhiram upataru-kṣetra-pālāya dattvā /
GK22vidsrgpu:3711: tumbī-vīnā-vinoda-vyavahita-sarakām ahni jīrṇe purāṇīṃ hālāṃ mālūra-koṣair yuvati-sahacarā barbarāḥ śīlayanti // VidSrk_35.44 *(1191) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3715: pariṇati-paripāṭi-vyākṛtenāruṇimnā hata-haritim aśeṣaṃ nāga-raṅgaṃ cakāsti // VidSrk_35.45 *(1192) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3720: tad-brahmāṇḍam iha kvacit kvacid api kṣoṇī kvacin nīradās te dvīpāntara-śālino jaladhayaḥ kvāpi kvacit bhūbhṛtaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3721: āścaryaṃ gaganasya ko 'pi mahimā sarvair amībhiḥ sthitair dūre pūraṇam asya śūnyam iti yan-nāmāpi nācchāditam // VidSrk_36.1 *(1193) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3724: kṣīrāmbu-rāśim avalokaya śeṣa-nālam ekaṃ jagat-traya-saraḥ-pṛthu-puṇḍarīkam // VidSrk_36.2 *(1194) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3725: viṣṇur babhāra bhagavān akhilāṃ dharitrīṃ taṃ pannagas tam api tat-sahitaṃ payodhiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3726: kumbhodbhavas tu tam apīyata helayaiva satyaṃ na kaścid avadhir mahatāṃ mahimnaḥ // VidSrk_36.3 *(1195) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3727: kiṃ brūmo jaladheḥ śriyaṃ sa hi khalu śrī-janma-bhūmiḥ svayaṃ vācyaḥ kiṃ mahimāpi yasya hi nava-dvīpaṃ mahīti śrutiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3728: tyāgaḥ ko 'pi sa tasya bibhrati jaganty asyārthino 'py ambudāḥ śakteḥ kaiva kathāpi yasya bhavati kṣobheṇa kalpāntaram // VidSrk_36.4 *(1196) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3731: etasmāj jaladher jalasya kaṇikāḥ kāścid gṛhītvā tataḥ pāthodāḥ paripūrayanti jagatīṃ ruddhāmbarā vāribhiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3732: asmān mandara-kūṭa-koṭi-ghaṭanā-bhīti-bhramat tārakāṃ prāpyaikāṃ jala-mānuṣīṃ tri-bhuvane śrīmān abhūd acyutaḥ // VidSrk_36.5 *(1197) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3736: āścaryaṃ vaḍavānalaḥ sa bhagavān āścaryam ambhonidhir yat-karmātiśayaṃ vicintya hṛdaye kampaḥ samutpadyate /
GK22vidsrgpu:3737: ekasyāśraya-ghasmarasya pibatas tṛptir na jātā jalair anyasyāpi mahātmano na vapuṣi svalpo 'pi toya-vyayaḥ // VidSrk_36.6 *(1198) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3739: nipīto yenāyaṃ taṭam adhivasaty asya sa munir dadhāno 'ntardāhaṃ sraja iva sa cāurvo 'sti dahanaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3740: tathā sarvasvārthe bahu-vimathito yena sa hariḥ svapity aṅke śrīmān ahaha mahimā ko 'pi jaladheḥ // VidSrk_36.7 *(1199) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3742: anyaḥ ko 'pi sa kumbha-saṃbhava-muner āstāṃ śikhī jāṭharo yaṃ sañcintya dukūla-vahni-sadṛśaḥ saṃlakṣyate vāḍavaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3743: vandyaṃ taj-jaṭharaṃ sa mīna-makara-grāhāvalis toyadhiḥ paścād pt pārśvam apūritāntara-viyad yatra svanan bhrāmyati // VidSrk_36.8 *(1200) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3745: śvāsonmūlita-merur ambara-tala-vyāpī nimajjan muhur yatrāsīc chiśumāra-vibhrama-karaḥ krīḍāvarāho hariḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3746: sīmā sarva-mahādbhuteṣu sa tathā vārāṃ patiḥ pīyate pītaḥ so 'pi na pūritaṃ ca jaṭharaṃ tasmai namo 'gastaye // VidSrk_36.9 *(1201) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3749: udyantu nāma subahūni mahā-mahāṃsi candro 'py alaṃ bhuvana-maṇḍala-maṇḍanāya /
GK22vidsrgpu:3750: sūryād ṛte na tad udeti na cāstam eti yenoditena dinam astam itena rātriḥ // VidSrk_36.10 *(1202) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3753: utpattir jamadagnitaḥ sa bhagavān devaḥ pinākī gurus tyāgaḥ sapta-samudra-mudrita-mahī-nirvyāja-dānāvadhiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3754: śauryaṃ yac ca na tad-girāṃ pathi nanu vyaktaṃ hi tat karmabhiḥ satyaṃ brahma-tapo-nidher bhagavataḥ kiṃ nāma lokāntaram // VidSrk_36.11 *(1203) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3755: ito vasati keśavaḥ puram itaś ca tad-vidviṣāṃ itaś ca śaraṇāgatāḥ śikhari-pakṣiṇaḥ śerate /
GK22vidsrgpu:3756: itaś ca vaḍavānalaḥ saha samasta-saṃvartakair aho vitatam ūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhor vapuḥ // VidSrk_36.12 *(1204) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3757: tat tāvad eva śaśinaḥ sphuritaṃ mahīyo yāvan na tigma-ruci-maṇḍalam abhyudeti /
GK22vidsrgpu:3758: abhyudgate sakala-dhāma-nidhau tu tasminn indoḥ sitābhra-paṭalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ // VidSrk_36.13 *(1205) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3761: apatyāni prāyo daśa daśa varāhī janayati kṣamābhāre dhuryaḥ sa punar iha nāsīn na bhavitā /
GK22vidsrgpu:3762: padaṃ kṛtvā yaḥ svaṃ phaṇi-pati-phaṇā-cakra-valaye nimajjantīm antarjaladhi vasudhām uttulayati // VidSrk_36.14 *(1206) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3764: teṣāṃ tṛṣaḥ pariṇamanti na yatra tatra nānyasya vāri-vibhavo 'pi ca tādṛg asti /
GK22vidsrgpu:3765: viśvopakāra-jananī-vyavasāya-siddhim ambhomucāṃ jaladhayo yadi pūrayanti // VidSrk_36.15 *(1207) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3766: kiṃ vācyo mahimā mahā-jalanidher yatrendra-vajrāhati- trasto bhūbhṛd amajjad ambu-vicalat-kaulīla-potākṛtiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3769: kiṃ brūmo harim asya viśvam udare kiṃ vā phaṇāṃ bhoginaḥ śete yatra hariḥ svayaṃ jalanidheḥ so 'py ekadeśe sthitaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3770: āścaryaṃ kalasodbhavo sa jaladhir yasyaika-hastodare gaṇḍūṣīyati paṅkajīyati phaṇī bhṛṅgīyati śrīpatiḥ // VidSrk_36.17 *(1209) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3773: vistāro yadi nedṛśo na yadi tad-gāmbhīryam ambhonidher na syād vā yadi sarva-sattva-viṣayas tādṛg-kṛpānugrahaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3774: antaḥ prajvalatā payāṃsi dahatā jvālāvalīr muñcatā ke na syur vaḍavānalena balinā bhasmāvaśeṣīkṛtāḥ // VidSrk_36.18 *(1210) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3776: uddīptāgnir asau munir vijayate yasyodare jīryataḥ pāthoder avaśiṣṭam ambu katham apy udgīrṇam anto 'rṇavam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3777: kiṃ cāsmāj jaṭharānalād iva navas tat-kālavānti-kramād niryātaḥ sa puno yamāya payasām antargato vāḍavaḥ // VidSrk_36.19 *(1211) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3779: yasmin āpas tad-adhikaraṇasyāsya vahner nivṛttiḥ saṃvāsānte vrajati jalade vaikṛtas tābhir eva /
GK22vidsrgpu:3780: asty anyo 'pi pralaya-rajanī-saṃnipāte 'py anidro yaḥ sāmudrīr aviratam imās tejasi sve juhoti // VidSrk_36.20 *(1212) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3786: asanto nābhyarthyāḥ suhṛd api na yācyas tanu-dhanaḥ priyā vṛttir nyāyyā caritam asubhaṅge 'py amalinam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3787: vipady uccaiḥ stheyaṃ padam anuvidheyaṃ ca mahatāṃ satāṃ kenoddiṣṭaṃ viṣamam asi-dhārā-vratam idam // VidSrk_37.1 *(1213) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3789: priya-prāyā vṛttir vinaya-madhuro vāci niyamaḥ prakṛtyā kalyāṇī matir anavagītaḥ paricayaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3790: puro vā paścād vā tad idam aviparyāsita-rasaṃ rahasyaṃ sādhūnām anupadi viśuddhaṃ vijayate // VidSrk_37.2 *(1214) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3791: nindantu nīti-nipuṇā yadi vā stuvantu lakṣmīḥ parāpatatu gacchatu vā yatheṣṭam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3792: adyaiva vā maraṇam astu yugāntare vā nyāyyāt pathaḥ pravicalanti padaṃ na dhīrāḥ // VidSrk_37.3 *(1215) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3795: vidhīyate guṇair eva tac ca muktā-maṇer iva // VidSrk_37.4 *(1216) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3797: yadā kiṃcij-jño 'haṃ gaja iva madāndhaḥ samabhavaṃ tadā sarvajño 'smīty abhavad avaliptaṃ mama manaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:3798: yadā kiṃcit kiṃcid budha-jana-sakāśād adhigataṃ tadā mūrkho 'smīti jvara iva mado me vyapagataḥ // VidSrk_37.5 *(1217) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3801: ekaḥ kurute cchidraṃ guṇavān anyaḥ prapūrayati // VidSrk_37.6 *(1218) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:3803: puṇḍrekṣu-kāṇḍa-suhṛdo madhurāmbu-bhāvāḥ santaḥ svayaṃ yadi namanti namanti kāmam /
GK22vidsrgpu:3804: āndolitās tu namana-spṛhayā pareṇa bhajyanta eva śatadhā na punar namanti // VidSrk_37.7 *(1219) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3806: satāṃ tu na viśaty eva yadi vā pāradāyate // VidSrk_37.8 *(1220) //
GK22vidsrgpu:3808: sarva-lokasya vā mūrdhni śīryate vana eva vā // VidSrk_37.9 *(1221) //

GK22vidsrgpu:4526: no meghāyitam artha-vāri-viraha-kliṣṭe 'rthi-śasye mayā noddhṛtta-pratipakṣa-parvata-kule nirghāta-vātāyitam /
GK22vidsrgpu:4527: no vā vāma-vilocanāmala-mukhāmbhojeṣu bhṛṅgāyitaṃ mātuḥ kevalam eva yauvana-vana-cchede kuṭhārāyitam // VidSrk_42.38 *(1498) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4529: ye kāruṇya-parigrahād apaṇita-svārthāḥ parārthān prati prāṇair apy upakurvate vyasaninas te sādhavo dūrataḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:4532: narendraiḥ śrī-candra-prabhṛtibhir atītaṃ sahṛdayair atikrāntaṃ tais taiḥ kavibhir abhinandādibhir api /

GK22vidsrgpu:4535: sudhā-sūtiḥ kṣīṇo gaṇapatir asav eka-daśanaḥ pada-bhraṣṭā devī sarid api surāṇāṃ bhagavatī /
GK22vidsrgpu:4536: dvi-jihvād anyeṣāṃ kva nanu guṇinām īśvara-juṣāṃ tvayā dṛṣṭo bhogaḥ kim iha viphalaṃ kliśyasi manaḥ // VidSrk_42.41 *(1501) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4537: gaccha trape virama dhairya dhiyaḥ kim atra mithyā viḍambayasi kiṃ puruṣābhimāna /

GK22vidsrgpu:4539: nirānandā dārā vyasana-vidhuro bāndhava-janoaḥ janī-bhūtaṃ mitraṃ dhana-viraha-dīnaḥ parijanaḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:4541: durvāso malināṅga-yaṣṭir abalā dṛṣṭo janaḥ sve gṛhe nīcāt karṇa-kaṭu śrutaṃ dhanam adād āruḍha-garvaṃ vacaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4542: anyo mandiram āgataḥ paricayād aprāpta-kāmo gataḥ khinnāḥ smaḥ sva-paropakāra-karaṇa-klībāṃ vahantas tanum // VidSrk_42.44 *(1504) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4543: kva paṅkaḥ kvāmbhojaṃ kvaṇad-ali-kulālāpa-madhuraṃ śiro raudraṃ kvāheḥ sphurad-uru-mayūkhaḥ kva ca maṇiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4544: kaliḥ kvāyaṃ pāpaḥ kva ca guṇa-nidher janma bhavato vidhiḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ sadṛśa-viniyogeṣv akuśalaḥ // VidSrk_42.45 *(1505) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4545: namasyaḥ prajñāvān parikalita-loka-traya-gatiḥ sukhī mūrkhaḥ so 'pi sva-gata-mahimādvaita-hṛdayaḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:4548: asmābhiś caturambu-rāśi-raśanāvacchedinīṃ medinīṃ bhrāmyadbhir na sa ko 'pi nistuṣa-guṇo dṛṣṭo viśiṣṭo janaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4549: yasyāgre cira-sañcitāni hṛdaye duḥkhāni saukhyāni vā saṃjalpya kṣaṇam ekam ardham athavā niḥśvasya viśrāmyate // VidSrk_42.47 *(1507) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4550: ito dāva-jvālaḥ sthala-bhuva ito jāla-jaṭilā ito vyādho dhāvaty ayam anupadaṃ vakrita-dhanuḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:4553: keneyaṃ śrī-vyasana-rucinā śoṇa viśrāṇitā te jāne jānu-dvaya-sajala evābhirāmas tvam āsīḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:4556: sindhor arṇaḥ sthagita-gaganābhoga-pātāla-kukṣaḥ potopāyā iha hi bahavo laṅghanāya kṣamante /

GK22vidsrgpu:4617: udbuddhebhyaḥ sudūraṃ ghana-rajani-tamaḥ-pūriteṣu drumeṣu prodgrīvaṃ paśya pāda-dvitaya-dhṛta-bhuvaḥ śreṇayaḥ pheravāṇām /

GK22vidsrgpu:4620: utkṛtyotkṛtya kṛttiṃ prathamam atha pṛthūcchopha-bhūyāṃso māṃsāny aṅga-sphik-pṛṣṭha-piṇḍādy-avayava-sulabhāny agra-pūtīni jagdhvā /
GK22vidsrgpu:4621: ātta-srnāyvyv-antra-netraḥ prakaṭita-daśanaḥ preta-raṅgaḥ karaṅkād aṅka-sthād asthi-saṃstha-sthapuṭa-gatam api kravyam avyagram atti // VidSrk_44.3 *(1530) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4626: antraiḥ kalpita-maṅgala-pratisarāḥ strī-hasta-raktotpala- vyaktottaṃsa-bhṛtaḥ pinahya sahasā hṛt-puṇḍarīka-srajaḥ /

GK22vidsrgpu:4629: etat pūtana-cakram akrama-kṛta-śvāsārdha-muktair vṛkān utpuṣṇad utpuṣṇat parito nṛ-māṃsa-vighasair ādardaraṃ krandataḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4636: atrāsthaḥ piśitaṃ śavasya kaṭhinair utkṛtya kṛtsnaṃ nakhair nagna-snāyu-karāla-ghora-kuharair mastiṣka-digdhāṅguliḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4637: saṃdaśyauṣṭha-piṭena bhugna-vadanaḥ pretaś citāgni-drutaṃ sūtkārair nalakāsthi-koṭara-gataṃ majjānam ākarṣati // VidSrk_44.8 *(1535) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4640: vaktrodvāntāḥ patantyaś chimiti-śikhi-śikhā-śreṇayo 'smin śivānāṃ asra-srotasy ajasra-sruta-bahala-vasā vāsa-visre svananti // VidSrk_44.9 *(1536) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4643: vidūrād abhyastair viyati bahuśo maṇḍala-śataiḥ udañcat-pucchāgra-stimita-vitataiḥ pakṣati-puṭaiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4646: pibaty eko 'nyasmād ghana-rudhiram āchidya caṣakaṃ lalaj-jihvo vaktrād galitam aparo leḍhu pibataḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4647: tataḥ styānāḥ kaścid bhuvi nipatitāḥ śoṇita-kaṇāḥ kṣaṇād ucca-grīvo rasayati lasad-dirgha-rasanaḥ // VidSrk_44.11 *(1538) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4649: citāgner ākṛṣṭaṃ nalaka-śikhara-protam asakṛtd sphuradbhir nirvāpya prabala-pavanaiḥ sphūtkṛta-śataiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4650: śiro nāraṃ pretaḥ kavalayati tṛṣṇā-vaśa-valat- karālāsyaḥ pluṣyad-vadana-kuharas tūdgirati ca // VidSrk_44.12 *(1539) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4654: sarvaiḥ krāmadbhir ulkānana-kavala-rasa-vyātta-vaktra-prabhābhir vyaktais taiḥ saṃvaladbhiḥ kṣaṇam aparam iva vyomni vṛttaṃ śmaśānam // VidSrk_44.13 *(1540) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4657: hasta-nyasta-kapāla-kandara-darī-muktābhra-dhārāḥ pibann unmukta-dhvani-bhinna-karṇa-kuharaḥ kravyād ayaṃ nṛtyati // VidSrk_44.14 *(1541) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4662: śrutvā dāśarathī suvela-kaṭake sānandam ardhe dhanuṣ- ṭaṅkāraiḥ paripūrayanti kakubhaḥ proñchanti kaukṣeyakān /
GK22vidsrgpu:4663: abhyasyanti tathaiva citra-phalake laṅkā-pates tat punar vaidehī-kuca-patra-valli-valanā-vaidagdhyam ardhe karāḥ // VidSrk_45.1 *(1542) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4664: saṃtuṣṭe tisṛṇāṃ purām api ripau kaṇḍūla-dor-maṇḍala- krīḍā-kṛtta-punaḥ-prarūḍha-śiraso vīrasya lipsor varam /
GK22vidsrgpu:4665: yācñā-dainya-parāñci yasya kalahāyante mithas tvaṃ vṛṇu tvaṃ vṛṇv ity abhito mukhāni sa daśagrīvaḥ kathaṃ kathyate // VidSrk_45.2 *(1543) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4666: eko bhavān mama samaṃ daśa vā namanti jyā-ghoṣa-pūrita-viyanti śarāsanāni /
GK22vidsrgpu:4667: tal loka-pāla-sahitaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena cāpaṃ gṛhāṇa sadṛśaṃ kṣaṇam astu yuddham // VidSrk_45.3 *(1544) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4668: re vṛddha-gṛdhra kim akāṇḍam iha pravīra dāvānale śalabhatāṃ labhase pramatta /
GK22vidsrgpu:4669: lakpāvasāna-pavanollasitasya sindhor ambho ruṇaddhi kim u saikata-setubandhaḥ // VidSrk_45.4 *(1545) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4671: āskandhāvadhi kaṇṭha-kāṇḍa-vipine drāc candrahāsāsinā chettuṃ prakramite mayaiva tarasā truṭyac-chirāsaṃtatau /
GK22vidsrgpu:4672: asmeraṃ galitāśru-gadgada-padaṃ bhinna-bhruvā yady abhūd vaktreṣv ekam api svayaṃ sa bhagavān tan me pramāṇaṃ śivaḥ // VidSrk_45.5 *(1546) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4673: devo yady api te guruḥ sa bhagavān ardhendu-cūḍāmaṇiḥ kṣoṇī-maṇḍalam ekaviṃśatim idaṃ vārān jitaṃ yady api /
GK22vidsrgpu:4674: draṣṭavyo 'sy amum eva bhārgava-baṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kuṭhāraṃ vahan paulastyasya puraḥ praṇāma-racita-pratyagra-sevāñjaliḥ // VidSrk_45.6 *(1547) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4675: rudrādes tulanaṃ svakaṇṭha-vipina-cchedo harer vāsanaṃ kārāveśmani puṣpakasya ca jayo yasyedṛśaḥ kelayaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:4676: so 'haṃ durjaya-bāhu-daṇḍa-sacivo laṅkeśvaras tasya me kā ślāghā ghuṇa-jarjareṇa dhanuṣā kṛṣṭena bhagnena vā // VidSrk_45.7 *(1548) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4679: vīra-prasūr jayati bhārgava-reṇukaiva yat tvāṃ triloka-tilakaṃ sutam abhyasūta /
GK22vidsrgpu:4680: śakrebha-kumbha-taṭa-khaṇḍana-caṇḍa-dhāmā yenaiṣa me na gaṇito yudhi candrahāsaḥ // VidSrk_45.8 *(1549) //
GK22vidsrgpu:4682: rāme rudra-śarāsanaṃ tulayati smitvā sthitaṃ pārthivaiḥ śiñjā-sañjana-tatpare 'vahasitaṃ dattvā mithas tālikāḥ /
